title: Police: 'Pedophile' Hugh Hefner Was Murdered
text:
By americatalks
Sunday, October 1, 2017 19:04
% of readers think this story is Fact. Add your two cents.

Tedx
What “police source”?  The guy at the end of the bar?
“According to reports” What reports?
“According to police” What police.  Who made this claim? What public records show charges made against Hefner?  What pubic records show any evidence of anything reported in this video?
Identify the source or be considered a conman looking for clicks on your YouTube channel.
Oct 1, 2017, 9:35 pm
Anonymous
Yep, it is the same goon who told us that 72 elite pedophiles would be arrested immediately, and Pizzagate would be completely exposed.   Never happened yet he still is on here squawking away without a single explanation of why he has made unfounded claims.
Oct 2, 2017, 4:59 am
Tedx
Americatalks about BS provided by fiction writers, trying to get gullible people to click on their site to increase advertising revenue.
Identify a credible source of these claims, or identify one police officer who endorses them, or site public records that document claims made in the broadcast, or be recognized as a conman just trying to collect clicks.
Oct 1, 2017, 9:57 pm
DISPENSER
I immediately knew that when I heard about a young man in his 90s dying some nefarious cover-up was afoot.  When they attempted to play it off as natural causes, that confirmed my suspicions.
Oct 1, 2017, 11:03 pm
It’s bullshit! Hugh was a good jewish boy that simply played his particularly deviant part in the grand plan . . . .
Oct 1, 2017, 11:49 pm
pulltabjunkie
He was  a 150 frikkin’ years old for cryin’ out loud. This story smells like BS.
Oct 2, 2017, 5:47 am
BLUE54
Maybe this is why these people want to keep Cuba closed so they can keep doing all of these pedophiles over there and probably in each country south from here and all of the Islands..
Oct 2, 2017, 2:09 pm
or they shouldnt be living next to the bermuda triangle
Oct 2, 2017, 2:22 pm
Canderson
If what you say is the truth then it must be investigated further.
“Hefner’s death was confirmed in a statement from Playboy Enterprises that said he ‘passed away today from natural causes at his home, The Playboy Mansion, surrounded by loved ones.’”
Oct 2, 2017, 3:13 pm
2QIK4U
Google results are 50/50 .now I don’t have a clue if it’s true or not.  I suppose he lived in Hollywood hills so the Hollywood police website would be the only one to answer it properly?
Oct 3, 2017, 9:01 pm
